name: Salsabeel
title: Electronics & Integration Engineer
about: Electronics & Integration Engineer passionate about bridging the gap between hardware and software. Skilled in designing embedded systems using Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and microcontrollers.
Experienced in real-time data communication using protocols like I2C, UART, and HTTP APIs. Builds robust systems that connect sensors to web dashboards for live monitoring.
Enjoys working on IoT, automation, and robotics projects. Strong believer in practical innovation through seamless hardware-software integration.

projects.name: IoT Sensor Dashboard
projects.desc: Real-time dashboard for sensor data from microcontrollers.
projects.longDesc: A complete IoT solution that collects live sensor data using Arduino, transmits it via WebSockets, and displays it on an interactive web dashboard built with Node.js and Chart.js. The system enables real-time environmental monitoring with fast, reliable updates and a user-friendly interface.
